traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} always says exactly what's on {PAWN_possessive} mind, especially if it's bugging {PAWN_objective}. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loves beautiful things, and really cares about how [PAWN_possessive] enviroment looks.
traits.name: aesthete

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] just isn't an "animal person." [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't like animals, and for the record, they don't seem to much like [PAWN_objective], either.
traits.name: animalhater

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loves animals. [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't feel quite the same about people, though.
traits.name: animallover

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and {PAWN_pronoun} tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike {PAWN_objective}.
traits.name: annoyingvoice

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is precisce and accurate with [PAWN_possessive] hands. [PAWN_pronoun] is skilled in art and crafting.
traits.name: artisan

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. {PAWN_pronoun} will become unhappy if if {PAWN_pronoun} has a bedroom that's too impressive. {PAWN_pronoun} also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. {PAWN_pronoun} never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to [PAWN_objective] before [PAWN_pronoun] even opens [PAWN_possessive] mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically attracted to both men and women.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. {PAWN_pronoun} is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes the human body is limited for a reason. To {PAWN_objective}, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a professional education in plant biology. [PAWN_possessive] knowledge comes in handy often.
traits.name: botanist
stats: x50% Food poison chance (chance to poison a meal)

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes to fight up close and personal. {PAWN_possessive} accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but {PAWN_pronoun}'ll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a terrible gardener. The only thing [PAWN_pronoun] seems able to grow is weeds.
traits.name: brownthumb

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loved playing with construction toys as a child, and still enjoys the thrill of "putting things together." But [PAWN_pronoun] tends to be a bit lost without clear instructions to follow.
traits.name: builder

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoys preparing meat for cooking. [PAWN_possessive] butchering speed is greatly increased, but only if [PAWN_pronoun]'s dealing with animal corpses. [PAWN_pronoun]'s terrible with mechanoids.
traits.name: butcher

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, {PAWN_pronoun} tried it... and {PAWN_pronoun} liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] takes more time to aim when shooting. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalfascination

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalinterest

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is claustrophobic. [PAWN_pronoun] is terrified of tight spaces, and thus is not a very competent miner.
traits.name: claustrophobic

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loves colder temperatures. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll complain less than others when it's chilly, but will whine more when it's hot.
traits.name: coldlover

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is unusually coordinated, and good at most any sort of skilled labor.
traits.name: coordinated
stats: -10.00% Food poison chance (chance to poison a meal)

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has good hand-eye coordination. [PAWN_pronoun] is quick to put [PAWN_possessive] sights on the target.
traits.name: crackshot

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a hard time seeing things clearly unless [PAWN_pronoun].
traits.name: cranialnervepalsy

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepybreathing

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to handle a firearm, and can shoot both quickly and accurately.
traits.name: deadshot

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always picked up skills pretty quickly.
traits.name: decentlearner

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked for a mining company that made special utilization of the deep drilling technology. [PAWN_pronoun] knows the nuances and quirks of deep drilling and uses them to [PAWN_possessive] advantage.
traits.name: deepdriller

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] can sleep through anything.
traits.name: deepsleeper

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has cat-like reflexes, and excels at evading attacks.
traits.name: deftlydodger

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is perenially unhappy. [PAWN_pronoun] has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to grease the wheels of diplomacy.
traits.name: diplomat

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a bit of a dunce, and learns at a slower rate than others.
traits.name: dunce

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a keen eye, and can quickly spot targets.
traits.name: eagle-eyed

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is quick with [PAWN_possessive] hands. [PAWN_pronoun] does tasks faster than others.
traits.name: fasthands

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a knack for learning. {PAWN_pronoun} picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to be where [PAWN_pronoun]'s going. [PAWN_pronoun] walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained to save lives in combat. [PAWN_pronoun] sacrifices quality for quantity.
traits.name: fieldmedic

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the solitude and tranquility inherent to long fishing sessions. {PAWN_pronoun} will prefer fishing above other activities.
traits.name: fisherman

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is experienced in construction projects. It was [PAWN_possessive] job to make sure everything went as planned and pick up where others left off.
traits.name: foreman

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically attracted to people of {PAWN_possessive} own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] devours [PAWN_possessive] meals much faster than others.
traits.name: glutton

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s life revolves around food. {PAWN_pronoun} gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a passion for food preparation. [PAWN_possessive] culinary creations are quite tasty, but [PAWN_pronoun] tends to take a while getting them "just right."
traits.name: gourmet
stats: -40.00% Food poison chance (chance to poison a meal)

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a fantastic memory for detail. {PAWN_pronoun} will learn new skills slightly faster than other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} needs a really impressive bedroom. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get what {PAWN_pronoun} wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a great gardener. The only thing [PAWN_pronoun] is a greener world.
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to haggle, and isn't bad at it. [PAWN_pronoun] tends to get better prices than most people.
traits.name: haggler

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a deep hatred toward all of humanity, seeing them as nothing more than egotistical meatbags.
traits.name: hateshumanity

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loves the heat. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll complain less than others when it's hot, but will whine more when it's cold.
traits.name: heatlover

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: [PAWN_pronoun] means well, but [PAWN_nameDef] is uncoordinated, and just not very good at any sort of skilled labor.
traits.name: inept
stats: +20.00% Food poison chance (chance to poison a meal)

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is intolerant of all lifeforms, whether they be mechanical or biological. There is always a chance they will randomly cause fights, especially when their mood is low.
traits.name: intolerance

traits.description: Strange new ideas just appear in [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind. Researching new technologies comes easily to [PAWN_objective], but [PAWN_pronoun] always seems distracted.
traits.name: inventor

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a high tolerance for pain.
traits.name: ironman

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s will is an iron shield. [PAWN_pronoun] keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is exceptionally kind. {PAWN_pronoun} has a special way of using kind words to brighten someone's day. {PAWN_pronoun} never insults others, and never judges people by their appearance.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a deep fondness toward all humans, seeing them as not only their own creators but as parental figures.
traits.name: loveshumanity

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] will become immobilized by pain more quickly than most.
traits.name: lowpaintolerance

traits.description: At range, [PAWN_nameDef] has better perception than most. [PAWN_pronoun] is more accurate than others.
traits.name: marksman

traits.description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, there's something exciting about getting hurt. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't know why, {PAWN_pronoun}'s just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has such a way with words that [PAWN_pronoun] always manages to cool down a tense situation. [PAWN_pronoun] could talk for days and people would still listen.
traits.name: masterdiplomat

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a natural aptitude for medical work. Between [PAWN_possessive] steady, skilled hands and [PAWN_possessive] inspiring bedside manner, patients in [PAWN_possessive] care will have little to fear.
traits.name: mastermedic

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] always gets the best deals.
traits.name: mastertrader

traits.description: A mechanized infantry unit, they do not think or feel.
traits.name: mech

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an unusual ability to learn.
traits.name: naturalgenius

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is fastidious to a fault.
traits.name: neatfreak
stats: -50.00% Food poison chance (chance to poison a meal)

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to have things squared away. [PAWN_pronoun] will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can get the better of [PAWN_objective].
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] picks at [PAWN_possessive] food, taking extra time to finish [PAWN_possessive] meals.
traits.name: nibbler

traits.description:
{PAWN_nameDef} likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

{PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

{PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. {PAWN_pronoun} seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. {PAWN_pronoun} can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] doesn't fear the dark at all.
traits.name: nyctophile

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is really afraid of the dark.
traits.name: nyctophobe

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get [PAWN_objective] down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] looks poor and useless upon first glance and is often overlooked.
traits.name: peasant

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] refuses to accept less than [PAWN_possessive] best in any endeavor, no matter how long it takes. [PAWN_pronoun]'s less likely to fail when doing something, but [PAWN_pronoun] works slowly.
traits.name: perfectionist
stats: -20.00% Food poison chance (chance to poison a meal)

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a professional education in pharmaceutical engineering. On the rim, this translates to proficiency in drug synthesizing.
traits.name: pharmacist

traits.description: Even when they have the best of intentions, some people just aren't cut out for medicine. [PAWN_nameDef] is one of those people.
traits.name: poormedic

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like [PAWN_objective].
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. [PAWN_pronoun] just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is psychically out of tune with others. [PAWN_pronoun] isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydull

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is like a psychic tuning fork. [PAWN_pronoun] is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallysensitive

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother {PAWN_objective} at all. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves fire. {PAWN_pronoun} will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, {PAWN_pronoun} will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if {PAWN_possessive} mood is low.
traits.name: pyromaniac

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether {PAWN_pronoun}'s sleeping on a bed or on the ground, {PAWN_pronoun} will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to deal with animals. [PAWN_pronoun] has managed many, many species of animals, everything from chickens to giant spiders.
traits.name: rancher

traits.description: NAME is an robot. As a robot HE is a bit faster and not really sensible for psychic phenomena.
traits.name: robot

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoys working with rocks. [PAWN_possessive] mining speed is increased, but [PAWN_possessive] lack of interest in other areas slows [PAWN_objective] down when doing other jobs. And [PAWN_pronoun] hates working with plants.
traits.name: rockhound

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is just naturally upbeat about [PAWN_possessive] situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a modern-day Da Vinci, with a creative mind that can grasp new ideas almost effortlessly. But [PAWN_pronoun]'s almost painfully slow when it comes to doing actual physical work.
traits.name: savant

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an awful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description: Due to the limitations of this androids mind: they are only barely able to understand and feel emotion. This makes them less than desired in social situations.
traits.name: simpleminded

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] seems to have a knack for medical work. Patients in [PAWN_possessive] care will likely fare well.
traits.name: skilledmedic

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loves idleness and hates anything productive. [PAWN_pronoun] moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is slow on the uptake. {PAWN_pronoun} learns much slower than others.
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is always falling behind the group whenever [PAWN_pronoun] goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is not very good at getting out of the way of blows.
traits.name: sluggish

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at manipulating in crafting. The rougher work of crafting comes easy.
traits.name: smith

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a talent for social manipulation, [PAWN_pronoun] uses it to [PAWN_possessive] advantage.
traits.name: socialworker

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was in management at a high-end restuarant specializing in exotic dishes. [PAWN_pronoun] has an eye for bad ingredients.
traits.name: sous-chef
stats: x50% Food poison chance (chance to poison a meal)

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is staggeringly ugly. [PAWN_possessive] face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at [PAWN_objective] while conversing.
traits.name: staggeringlyugly

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s body is stronger than normal against diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
traits.name: strongconstitution

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] just can't seem to help but get taken advantage of while trading. [PAWN_pronoun]'ll pay more than [PAWN_pronoun] should, and still think that [PAWN_pronoun] got a good deal.
traits.name: sucker

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a naturally powerful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has had professional training in melee combat. [PAWN_pronoun] is more likely to land [PAWN_possessive] strikes and dodge opponent's.
traits.name: swordsman

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. [PAWN_pronoun] strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is too smart for {PAWN_possessive} own good. {PAWN_pronoun} learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. {PAWN_pronoun} will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
traits.name: torturedartist

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. {PAWN_pronoun} takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. {PAWN_pronoun} is extremely hard to kill.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels limited in {PAWN_possessive} feeble human body. {PAWN_pronoun} often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
traits.name: transhumanist

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! [PAWN_nameDef] just likes pulling the trigger. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: Subtlety? Diplomacy? [PAWN_nameDef] barely even understands the meaning of the words.
traits.name: uncouth

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no need to experience the outdoors or light. {PAWN_pronoun} will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long {PAWN_pronoun} stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an exceptionally high tolerance for pain. [PAWN_pronoun] is unlikely to be immobilized by it.
traits.name: unstoppable

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. [PAWN_pronoun] will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can easily get the better of [PAWN_objective].
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is on a hair-trigger all the time. [PAWN_pronoun] is the first to break in any tough situation.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is especially vulnerable to diseases, pathogens and toxic fallout.
traits.name: weakconstitution

traits.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize {PAWN_objective}.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] knows a lot and is very intelligent.
traits.name: wise

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description: [PAWN_nameDef] hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
traits.name: xenophobe
